text: This is the best place for breakfast in Lachine. The service is always friendly and effective. The portions are big and it's not too pricy. The only things I have to say is that the potatoes are a bit too salty and they should offer real maple syrup (being a bit picky here). All the plates I've tried are really good and they make good smoothies/fresh juice (I came here about 20 times ). I recommend this place if you just want a good and  not too fancy place for breakfast. Make sure you have a big appetite because your in for a treat.
Ce restaurant de déjeuners offre plusieurs choix sur son menu, ce qui rend tout le monde heureux à chaque fois!
Perfect breakfast and nice service. Pot of coffee on a table, great food variety which includes crepes (buckwheat crepes the first time I have ever seen), eggs, yogurt. English menu is available.
Très bon service.  Ouvert depuis 5h30am.  Service rapide pour déjeuner tranquille ou entre amis.  Simple.

Très impressionné de ce restaurant !  Les déjeuners sont excellents !! Serveuses rapides, professionnelles et acharnées à livrer un excellent service.  Avez-vous déjà remarqué la propreté de ce restaurant ? On pourrait y manger directement sur la table et ça resterait hygiénique. C'est vraiment TRÈS propre !!  Les smoothies fraise-banane à base de yogourt est un must pour commencer la journée !!
Fast service, super friendly, good portions, delicious and they left an entire pot of coffee on my table- win/win :)  Best breakfast I've had in Lachine so far :)

Après avoir fait l'expérience d'autre resto Eggsquis, je dois dire que le nom est mal choisi pour cette succursale.  Les mets sont moyen et le service vraiment merdique.  Un sourire pourrait facilement augmenter le pourcentage du pourboire.  C'est peut-être la meilleure place pour déjeuner à Lachine, mais encore la, il n'y a vraiment rien a Lachine.

Pretty the only breakfast place in Lachine. Nothing fancy but food is good for the price.   Portions are quite big. Took a ham send cheese pancake and was full after only eating 1/3 of it.  Service is not always super quick and paying the bill is sometime a challenge as you need to pay at the cash and line up could be long.  They also have a terrace outside during summer and that's nice.  Affordable for decent food.

La place à déjeuner par excellence à Lachine. Ancien Pizza Hut, la nourriture que l'on y sert est un vrai délice. Je ne dirais pas que j'ai toujours aimé ce qu'on ma servis mais la majorité du temps, oui. C'est probablement qu'une question de goût. Les choix sont variés et vraiment pour tous les goûts. Les fruits sont frais...ce qui est parfois un problème dans les endroits à déjeuner. Le service est relativement rapide, les serveuses sont très sympathiques. J'aime le fait que, quand on le demande, elle peut nous laisser la carafe de café sur la table.   Les prix sont raisonnables, quoi que un peu élevé. Par contre, les portions sont très grosses, presque trop. Il est toujours mieux d'y aller très de bonne heure car l'endroit ce remplis très vite et devient vite difficile d'avoir un place pour s'assir.

Pour ce qui est de la nourriture c'est vraiment bon et je crois que c'est l'une des places les plus populaire de Lachine.  La semaine c'est un peut plus tranquille mais le week-end c'est jam-pack...  Pour le service par contre, il est long, on dirait que le staff est mal former ou incomplet....on peut parfois attendre plus de 15 min. Pour une facture même après avoir avertis la serveuse 2x.....

This is my absolute favourite breakfast restaurant. I've been coming here multiple times per week since 2007. The food is excellent and the service staff are always pleasant and welcoming. You always receive a pot of coffee for your table. I've never had a bad experience in my seven years of frequenting this establishment. If you're in the area, stop by to treat yourself.  Bonjour à: Gabrielle, Brigitte, Mélanie, Chantal, et les autres filles.

One of the best breakfast/brunch spots in South Shore hands down. Crêpes with fruit or the continental breakfast are my picks. The place is always packed and although very busy the service is always very good and timely.

I've been going to egssquis in Laval since it opened and always enjoyed the experience. Good breakfast, efficient service, and a pot of coffee on the table. Today I stopped in at this locale, and it was pretty much the same. Everything was what I expected.  The bad..when I'm paying 10$ or 15$ for breakfast they should have decent cutlery. The fork was so thin that it felt weird holding it. And another area to improve, the mens bathroom..enough said.

Great breakfast option in the Lachine area, with reasonable prices, fast service and just about what you would expect to get from a classic breakfast restaurant. Eggs, seasoned potatoes, breakfast sausage, bacon, pancakes/crêpes, french toast, ... you know the drill. Plus, a whole pot of coffee gets left on your table for you to refill your mug at your own pace. Yay!  Some of my favourites are their eggs benedict (la princesse, with asparagus, ham and swiss cheese is my go-to, and I always end up taking leftovers home because it's so BIG) and their crêpes stuffed with fruit (the crêpes were recommended to me before I had ever gone to this location and I can see why they were, they are very well made), but you can't go wrong with their classic breakfast plates.   The best deals come from their early bird menu, which is before 9 AM and consists of 4 options that they regularly change. Pretty much all the options are under 11$ and are all really huge, I'm always taking leftovers home. I make sure to come for the early bird specials not only because of the prices, but because it gets really crowded and noisy later in the day.  The only thing I really don't like about this place is their baked beans, which are included in a lot of their dishes on the side. They must be from a tin, because they sure as hell don't taste homemade. So nasty, please spare your taste buds and leave them untouched like I do (as much as I feel bad for wasting the food, it's not worth it).
